con:call.name: RetrieveInsurancePolicy Request
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:RetrieveInsurancePolicy>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <tem:InsurancePolicyRequest>\r <rad:SecurityGUID>?</rad:SecurityGUID>\r <rad:CarrierCodes>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <rad1:ConfirmationNumber>?</rad1:ConfirmationNumber>\r <rad1:AgreeToTerms>?</rad1:AgreeToTerms>\r <rad1:ProcessPolicyRequestWithHeldQuote>?</rad1:ProcessPolicyRequestWithHeldQuote>\r <rad1:OriginatingAirport>?</rad1:OriginatingAirport>\r <rad1:DestinationAirport>?</rad1:DestinationAirport>\r <rad1:TransactionDate>?</rad1:TransactionDate>\r <rad1:TripStartDate>?</rad1:TripStartDate>\r <rad1:TripEndDate>?</rad1:TripEndDate>\r <rad1:OriginatingAirportGMTOffset>?</rad1:OriginatingAirportGMTOffset>\r <rad1:Segments>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <rad1:RequestSegment>\r <rad1:Origin>?</rad1:Origin>\r <rad1:Destination>?</rad1:Destination>\r <rad1:DepartureDate>?</rad1:DepartureDate>\r <rad1:ArrivalDate>?</rad1:ArrivalDate>\r <rad1:OriginOffsetFromGMT>?</rad1:OriginOffsetFromGMT>\r <rad1:DestinationOffsetFromGMT>?</rad1:DestinationOffsetFromGMT>\r <rad1:Insured>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <rad1:RequestInsured>\r <rad1:Title>?</rad1:Title>\r <rad1:FirstName>?</rad1:FirstName>\r <rad1:MiddleName>?</rad1:MiddleName>\r <rad1:LastName>?</rad1:LastName>\r <rad1:AlternateName>?</rad1:AlternateName>\r <rad1:RelationToInsured>?</rad1:RelationToInsured>\r <rad1:BirthDate>?</rad1:BirthDate>\r <rad1:Age>?</rad1:Age>\r <rad1:PassengerTypeCode>?</rad1:PassengerTypeCode>\r <rad1:Gender>?</rad1:Gender>\r <rad1:IsPrimaryInsured>?</rad1:IsPrimaryInsured>\r <rad1:MarketingOptIn>?</rad1:MarketingOptIn>\r <rad1:Beneficiary>\r <rad1:FirstName>?</rad1:FirstName>\r <rad1:LastName>?</rad1:LastName>\r </rad1:Beneficiary>\r <rad1:Address>\r <rad1:StreetLn1Nm>?</rad1:StreetLn1Nm>\r <rad1:StreetLn2Nm>?</rad1:StreetLn2Nm>\r <rad1:StreetLn3Nm>?</rad1:StreetLn3Nm>\r <rad1:CityNm>?</rad1:CityNm>\r <rad1:StateNm>?</rad1:StateNm>\r <rad1:ZipCd>?</rad1:ZipCd>\r <rad1:CntryNm>?</rad1:CntryNm>\r <rad1:HomePhoneNo>?</rad1:HomePhoneNo>\r <rad1:WorkPhoneNo>?</rad1:WorkPhoneNo>\r <rad1:CellPhoneNo>?</rad1:CellPhoneNo>\r <rad1:FaxNo>?</rad1:FaxNo>\r <rad1:EmailAddr>?</rad1:EmailAddr>\r </rad1:Address>\r </rad1:RequestInsured>\r </rad1:Insured>\r </rad1:RequestSegment>\r </rad1:Segments>\r </rad1:Trip>\r </tem:InsurancePolicyRequest>\r </tem:RetrieveInsurancePolicy>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
